description:
UniversalDoctor Speaker® is an application that endeavours to ease communication between health users and health professionals, wherever they are and regardless of where they come from. 

If you travel to a country where you are concerned the healthcare workers will not understand you, remember that UniversalDoctor Speaker® can facilitate communication at the time you need it most. 

Download all the UniversalDoctor Speaker texts and hundreds of audio files in SIX LANGUAGES.

Select the patient language and the health personnel language to begin communication in ENGLISH, SPANISH, CHINESE, FRENCH, PORTUGUESE, GERMAN.

Patients: 
------- 
The application will permit patients or potential health users to travel to any country without the worry of not being understood. 

If you are a patient or have an accident, you can explain your situation in your own language and translate it into a different language using sentences regarding: 

-Immediate medical requirements 
-Symptoms for very urgent visits 
-Accidents 
-Violent events 
-Regular general symptoms 
-Most common illnesses 
-Requirements during a hospital stay 
-Questions regarding a medical treatment 


Health personnel: 
-------------- 
If you are a healthcare worker and find it hard to communicate with a patient because you do not speak the same language, the application will enable you to improve this very important part of your work, through sentences regarding: 

-The reason for the medical visit 
-Medical records and usual treatment 
-Medical background 
-Symptomatology divided into apparatuses and systems 
-Physical examination and complementary tests 
-Diagnosis 
-Treatment
